content:
[Georgia Senate 2022 | Rural Southwest Georgia (Dougherty County - Albany) | P1: M, 58, Peanut farmer, Lee County, Black, third-generation farmer, land ownership important]
Q: Thank you for being here. Tell me about life in this part of Georgia.
"Farming is what built this area but it's getting harder every year. Input costs are insane - fertilizer, diesel, everything. Peanut prices don't keep up. I'm the third generation on this land and I worry about passing it on."
participant_profile: M, 58, Peanut farmer, Lee County, Black, third-generation farmer, land ownership important
section: Opening: Life in Rural Southwest Georgia
preceding_moderator_q: Thank you for being here. Tell me about life in this part of Georgia.
content_original: Farming is what built this area but it's getting harder every year. Input costs are insane - fertilizer, diesel, everything. Peanut prices don't keep up. I'm the third generation on this land and I worry about passing it on.

content:
[Georgia Senate 2022 | Rural Southwest Georgia (Dougherty County - Albany) | P2: F, 44, Hospital nurse, Albany, Black, sole regional hospital, healthcare access worried]
Q: Thank you for being here. Tell me about life in this part of Georgia.
"I work at Phoebe Putney - it's the only hospital for miles. We're understaffed, overwhelmed. If people here need specialized care, they drive to Macon or Atlanta. That's two hours. People die in that gap."
participant_profile: F, 44, Hospital nurse, Albany, Black, sole regional hospital, healthcare access worried

content:
[Georgia Senate 2022 | Rural Southwest Georgia (Dougherty County - Albany) | P4: F, 35, Dollar General manager, Dawson, Black, underemployed despite degree]
